Name: Lago Cosmo
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Cosmo with cranberry vodka in place of citrus vodka and orange juice in place of cranberry juice.
History: Discovered in 2003 at Nectar at Bellagio, Las Vegas, USA. For more recipes, origins and history behind the Cosmopolitan cocktail, see our Cosmopolitan page .
Nutrition: One serving of Lago Cosmo contains 231 calories
